ComicInfo.Title: The American Way of Death Part One; Slammer
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Cold Cold Ground”—The morgue full of 13 dead Judges were only the beginning… of the end! Dredd’s most vicious and unstoppable enemies—the Dark Judges—are clawing their way into Mega-City One, determined to transform it into a new city of the dead. That’s right: Judges Death! Mortis! Fire! Fear! (And some new friends!) But the only thing more horrifying than the Dark Judges’ onslaught are drastic measures the Justice Department is willing to take to repel them.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Nelson Daniel | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Michael Avon Oeming | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-07 09:33:08. [CVDB447532]

ComicInfo.Teams: Dark Judges, Judges of Mega-City One, Psi-Division
ComicInfo.Locations: Earth, Mega-City One, Saturn, Space, Titan
